column4: How do I find the path of the DVD\CD drives in the syntax "/dev/*"?
you don't. you need to guess. my CD could be, for instance, /dev/hdb, if i have PATA and the CD is the primary slave
remove the "quiet" option from the kernel options
How do I disable the kernel quiet option? Is it in the menu.Ist file?
one is the normal kernel, another is the recovery mode, and the third honestly i don't know
there is no quiet in recovery. Should I just remove "quiet" in normal?
also should I remove the "quiet" in "/boot/vmlinuz-2.6.20-15-generic root=UUID=bbfb28c1-8baf-4407-8aae-def237bf92f1 ro quiet splash"?
remove it from everywhere it appears
I'm not sure why compiz crashes.
you might try asking in #compiz-fusion as well
